name: Battle Helicopter Combat
description:
In this game, you will have to stay very alert at the battle arena, aware of any approaching enemy warships and helicopters. Steer your apache helicopter towards the enemy gunships on the battlefield and launch an air attack to stop them in their tracks. There will be multiple fighter helicopters to select from to launch your air attack, so choose carefully and wisely. Do not under estimate the enemy battle techniques as they are very well equipped and would come at you with full force.

Game features:
- Smooth apache helicopter game play
- Multiple levels with increasing difficulty
- A wide range of gunship helicopters to choose from
- Touch enemy battle attacks
- Crazy 3D graphics
- Realistic helicopter flying experience
